===Particle===
{{zh-particle}}

# optional particle put at the end of a conditional clause
#: {{zh-x|如果 沒有 人 捐助 的話，這 個 小孩 就 會 永遠 失明。|If no one offers assistance this kid will become permanently blind.}}
#: {{zh-x|要是{shi} 考試 不 及格 的話，怎麼.辦？|If I don't pass my exams, what do I do?}}
#: {{zh-x|你 今天 出去 的話，記得{de} 鎖上 前門。|If you go out today remember to lock the front door.}}

====Usage notes====
* As per examples above, {{lang|zh|的話／的话}} (dehuà) may be used with or without {{zh-l|如果}} or {{zh-l|要是}} at the beginning of the sentence.
